author: Reuters
title: Hong Kong has no plans to use emergency powers for other laws, leader Carrie Lam says
description: Lam on Friday invoked the emergency powers for the first time in more than 50 years in a dramatic move intended to quell escalating violence in the Chinese-ruled city.
content: Hong Kong leader Carrie Lam said on Tuesday her administration had no plans to use emergency powers for the introduction of other laws and that the Chinese territory was equipped to handle the current situation on its own as the city braced for further demons… [+577 chars]
